articles.title: PSU Banks like SBI, Canara, Union poised for re-rating, according to this analyst - CNBCTV18
articles.description: By financial year 2026, the earnings pool of PSU banks is likely to grow to 1.7 lakh crore from 57,300 crore in financial year 2022, according to Motilal Oswal.
